description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪律检查委员会书记、山东省委书记、江西省委书记、江西省省长、武汉市市长等职。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and the Communist Party of China, a former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee, Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee, Governor of Jiangxi Province, and Mayor of Wuhan.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal control institution of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江西省上饶市的县。
description.en: A county in Shangrao, Jiangxi Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖北省武汉市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Wuhan City, Hubei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国江西省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jiangxi Province, China.

en: Jiangxi Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江西省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jiangxi Province.

en: Shandong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shandong Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国家副主席。
description.en: Former major leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice President of the PRC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第一次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第一次全体会议
en: 1st Plenary Session of the 16th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 选举产生了新一届中共中央政治局、中央政治局常务委员会和中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Elected the new Politburo, Politburo Standing Committee, and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会第一次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会第一次全体会议
en: 1st Plenary Session of the 17th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 选举产生了新一届中共中央政治局、中央政治局常务委员会和中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Elected the new Politburo, Politburo Standing Committee, and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记。
description.en: Former major leader of the CPC and the PRC, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记。
description.en: Former major leader of the CPC and the PRC, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 2006年爆发于中国上海市的一起涉及社会保障基金的重大腐败案件，导致时任中共上海市委书记陈良宇下台。
description.en: A major corruption case involving social security funds that broke out in Shanghai, China in 2006, leading to the downfall of then-Shanghai Party Secretary Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记，后因上海社保基金挪用案被判刑。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, who was later sentenced to prison for his role in the Shanghai pension scandal.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国官员，曾任国家食品药品监督管理局局长，后因受贿、玩忽职守罪被判处死刑。
description.en: An official of the People's Republic of China, former director of the State Food and Drug Administration, who was sentenced to death for bribery and dereliction of duty.

description.zh-cn: 吴官正的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Wu Guanzheng.

description.zh-cn: 吴官正的长子，商人。曾任青岛天逸海湾置业有限公司董事长，后在青岛被谋杀。
description.en: Eldest son of Wu Guanzheng, a businessman. He was the chairman of Qingdao Tianyi Haiwan Real Estate Co., Ltd. and was later murdered in Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 吴官正的次子，现任中国光大集团股份公司执行董事、副总经理、党委委员。
description.en: Second son of Wu Guanzheng, currently serving as an executive director, deputy general manager, and party committee member of China Everbright Group Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 吴官正的长子吴祖华于2007年1月在山东青岛出差时被谋杀。据维基解密披露，此事对吴官正造成巨大打击。
description.en: Wu Zuhua, the eldest son of Wu Guanzheng, was murdered during a business trip in Qingdao, Shandong in January 2007. According to WikiLeaks, this event had a profound impact on Wu Guanzheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共山东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。
description.en: Former major leader of the CPC and the PRC, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共江西省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共江西省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任江西省省长，后因徇私舞弊罪被判刑。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Governor of Jiangxi Province and was later imprisoned for favoritism and fraud.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任江西省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Governor of Jiangxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国光大集团股份公司

zh-cn: 中国光大集团股份公司

description.zh-cn: 总部位于北京的中央企业，由财政部和中央汇金投资有限责任公司发起设立。
description.en: A central state-owned enterprise headquartered in Beijing, established by the Ministry of Finance and Central Huijin Investment Ltd.

degree.zh-cn: 热工测量及自动控制专业本科及研究生
degree.en: Undergraduate and graduate in Thermal Engineering Measurement and Automatic Control

description.zh-cn: 1959年至1965年在清华大学动力系热工测量及自动控制专业学习，1965年至1968年为该专业研究生。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Power Engineering's Thermal Engineering Measurement and Automatic Control program from 1959 to 1965, and was a graduate student in the same program from 1965 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 吴官正是中国共产党党员及高级领导人。
description.en: Wu Guanzheng is a member and senior leader of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党江西省委员会
中国共产党山东省委员会
中国共产党中央政治局
中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 吴官正是胡锦涛在清华大学的同校同届校友。
description.en: Wu Guanzheng and Hu Jintao were university classmates from the same year at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 吴官正和曾庆红是江西同乡。
description.en: Wu Guanzheng and Zeng Qinghong are from the same hometown in Jiangxi.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会第一次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在中共十六届一中全会上当选为中共中央政治局常委，并出任中共中央纪委书记。
description.en: Was elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and appointed as the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection at the 1st Plenary Session of the 16th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会第一次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 因年龄原因，在中共十七届一中全会后卸任中共中央政治局常委和中央纪委书记的职务并退休。
description.en: Due to age limits, he retired from his positions as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection after the 1st Plenary Session of the 17th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 接替尉健行出任中共中央纪委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Wei Jianxing as the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 接替吴官正出任中共中央纪委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Wu Guanzheng as the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 在其中央纪委书记任上，查办了时任中共上海市委书记陈良宇。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, he investigated Chen Liangyu, who was then the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 在其中央纪委书记任上，查办了时任国家食品药品监督管理局局长郑筱萸。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, he investigated Zheng Xiaoyu, who was then the Director of the State Food and Drug Administration.

description.zh-cn: 在其中央纪委书记任上，负责查处了上海社保基金挪用案。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, he was responsible for investigating the Shanghai pension scandal.

description.zh-cn: 吴祖华是吴官正的长子。
description.en: Wu Zuhua is the eldest son of Wu Guanzheng.

description.zh-cn: 吴少华是吴官正的次子。
description.en: Wu Shaohua is the second son of Wu Guanzheng.

relationships.target: 中国光大集团股份公司

position.zh-cn: 执行董事、副总经理、党委委员
position.en: Executive Director, Deputy General Manager, Party Committee Member

description.zh-cn: 吴祖华于2007年1月在山东青岛出差时被谋杀身亡。
description.en: Wu Zuhua was murdered during a business trip in Qingdao, Shandong in January 2007.

description.zh-cn: 据维基解密披露，吴官正因长子吴祖华被谋杀一事受到巨大打击，并称其子为他的政治事业而牺牲。
description.en: According to WikiLeaks, Wu Guanzheng was devastated by the murder of his eldest son, Wu Zuhua, and stated that his son sacrificed for his political career.

description.zh-cn: 接替赵志浩出任中共山东省委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Zhao Zhihao as the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 接替吴官正出任中共山东省委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Wu Guanzheng as the Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 接替毛致用出任中共江西省委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Mao Zhiyong as the Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 接替吴官正出任中共江西省委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Wu Guanzheng as the Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 接替倪献策出任江西省省长。
description.en: Succeeded Ni Xiance as the Governor of Jiangxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 接替吴官正出任江西省省长。
description.en: Succeeded Wu Guanzheng as the Governor of Jiangxi Province.
